description: Unlinks a federated identity from an existing account. Unlinked logins will be considered new identities next time they are seen. Removing the last linked login will make this identity inaccessible. This is a public API. You do not need any credentials to call this API.

parameters.name: IdentityId
parameters.description: A unique identifier in the format REGION:GUID.

parameters.name: Logins
parameters.description: A set of optional name-value pairs that map provider names to provider tokens. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: LoginsToRemove
parameters.description: Provider names to unlink from this identity. (string) ---
